page.title: 06RECREATION IN DIPTON.
page.content:
MY DAD'S SPARE TIME by ADAM SMITH. {Dad's age; 29. Performs on the Amateur {Stage; Plays Computer Games & watches {T.V.; Likes Board games such as CHESS, {SCRABBLE & MONOPOLY;Does Odd Jobs {around the house;Spends a lot of time {looking for employment.
{MY BROTHER'S SPARE TIME by M.BLACKWOOD Stephen's age; 13.Rides his motorbike; Attends Discos & Youth Clubs;Visits the Cinema;Swims in local Baths on Sundays;Goes to Karate Lessons on Monday nights.
MY SPARE TIME by SCOTT CAISLEY. {Scott's age;8. Is learning to play the {electric organ;Plays with his large {collection of toy cars;Rides his {B.M.X.bike;Helps his Mam to tidy the {house.
